com.dhemery.victor

Interface IosApplication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrankApplication

    public interface IosApplication
    Interacts with an application running on an iOS device.
    Author:
    Dale Emery

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Report whether the application is running.
      IosApplicationOrientation orientation()
      Report the application's orientation.
      String sendMessage(String name, Object... arguments)
      Send a message with arguments to the application delegate.
      void typeIntoKeyboard(String text)
      Type text into the device's keyboard.
      IosView view(IosViewIdentifier id)
      Create a driver that can interact with the views identified by an identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Report whether the application is running.

      • orientation

        IosApplicationOrientation orientation()
        Report the application's orientation.

      • sendMessage

        String sendMessage(String name,
                 Object... arguments)
        Send a message with arguments to the application delegate.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the message to send (an Objective-C selector).
        arguments - arguments to send with the message.
        Returns:
        the application delegate's response.

      • typeIntoKeyboard

        void typeIntoKeyboard(String text)
        Type text into the device's keyboard. This method assumes that the keyboard is displayed.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to type.

      • view

        IosView view(IosViewIdentifier id)
        Create a driver that can interact with the views identified by an identifier.
